title: I Got the Shit Kicked Out of Me
description: Contestants win money by getting an ass whooping, taking a dip in the shit tank, and many other punishments.
quote: Swimming through the vat of hyena urine is not as bad as it sounds!
altHero: colorful host Mary Rich talks with Cassius Green
alt1: Mary Rich with another contestant who is soaking wet
alt3: Cassius Green getting beat up by three large men
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
